properties.name: Machu Picchu
properties.description: New Seven Wonders ancient Incan citadel set high in the Andes mountains

properties.name: Rainbow Mountain (Vinicunca)
properties.description: Striped mountain in shades of red, lavender, and turquoise from mineral deposits

properties.name: Colca Canyon
properties.description: Second-deepest canyon in the world (3,400m) with soaring Andean condors

properties.name: Lake Titicaca
properties.description: World's highest navigable lake, sacred to Incas as birthplace of the sun

properties.name: Huacachina Oasis
properties.description: South America's only natural desert oasis with towering sand dunes

properties.name: Sacred Valley
properties.description: Inca heartland with terraces, ruins, and traditional villages between Cusco and Machu Picchu

properties.name: Nazca Lines
properties.description: Mysterious ancient geoglyphs visible only from the air, UNESCO World Heritage

properties.name: Huascaran National Park
properties.description: World's highest tropical mountain range with 600 glaciers and turquoise lakes

properties.name: Manu National Park
properties.description: One of most biodiverse rainforest areas on planet, largely unexplored
